|description = These special training grounds in the mountains west of Port Ormos have been reserved for the Nilotpala Cup Beast Tamers Tournament. You can learn how to conduct Coordinated Assaults and Zone Defense here to strengthen your bonds with your Fungi.<br />It is said that these training grounds were once a Domain infested by monsters and outlaws that was declared a "suitable venue for special training" by the organizer after many surveys.<br />"Actual combat can quickly improve your skills," so they say, and not falsely, but there are some foes in here that are still very concerning indeed...
}}
'''Special Training''' is a part of Prepare for Tournament in the [[Fabulous Fungus Frenzy]] event.

On the event screen, it is represented by the [[File:Fabulous Fungus Frenzy Special Training.png|25x25px]] icon.

==Tutorial==
;Coordinated Assaults
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Contest Rules 1.png
|text1    = In the Fabulous Fungus Frenzy gameplay mode, your Elemental Skill will be changed to the Focus Attack command, which can command all the Fungi in your team to attack a single target.
|image2   = Tutorial Contest Rules 2.png
|text2    = Click on the corresponding button or avatar and select the Fungus to unleash its Skill, which is a powerful ability that can help you take control of the battle.
|image3   = Tutorial Contest Rules 3.png
|text3    = Each of your Fungi can only use its Skill a limited number of times. Pick up Plauditory Protections that appear during the battle to increase the number of uses their Skills have.<br />Plauditory Protections can only exist for a limited duration of time. Make sure to pick them up in time.
|image4   = Tutorial Coordinated Assaults.png
|text4    = During Coordinated Assaults, you must command your Fungi to destroy 3 zones held by your opponents.<br />The less time you take to defeat these opponents and the fewer Fungi you lose in the process, the higher your battle score will be.
|image5   = Tutorial Contest Rules 4.png
|text5    = In some stages, you can switch supporting Fungi into combat if one of the current active Fungi falls.
}}

;Zone Defense
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Contest Rules 1.png
|text1    = In the Fabulous Fungus Frenzy gameplay mode, your Elemental Skill will be changed to the Focus Attack command, which can command all the Fungi in your team to attack a single target.
|image2   = Tutorial Contest Rules 2.png

Pick up Plauditory Protections that appear during the battle to increase the number of uses their Skills have.<br />Plauditory Protections can only exist for a limited duration of time. Make sure to pick them up in time.
|image4   = Tutorial Zone Defense.png
|text4    = During the Zone Defense challenge, you must command your Fungi to defend a Ley Line Monolith.<br />The less damage the Monolith has taken and the fewer Fungi you lose by the time the challenge ends, the higher your battle score will be.
|image5   = Tutorial Contest Rules 4.png
|text5    = In some stages, you can switch supporting Fungi into combat if one of the current active Fungi falls.
}}
